mapper.select: select `match`.*, stadium.*, facility.*, `time`.*, manager.mn_me_num, if(ifnull(T1.t1, 0) + ifnull(T2.t2, 0) + ifnull(T3.t3, 0) + ifnull(mn_me_num, 0)= 0, true, false) as T, (select month(mt_date) * 100000 + day(mt_date) * 1000 + ti_num) as f from `match` join stadium on mt_st_num = st_num join facility on st_fa_num = fa_num join `time` on mt_ti_num = ti_num left join manager on mn_mt_num = mt_num left join -- 매니저가 해당 날짜에 이미 등록된 매치가 있으면 해당 매치 제외 (select mt_ti_num as t1 from manager join `match` on mn_mt_num = mt_num where mn_me_num = 3 and mt_date = '2023-11-10') as T1 on T1.t1 = mt_ti_num left join -- 매치는 2시간동안 진행되므로 1시간 전 매치도 제외 (select if(mt_ti_num + 1 < 168, mt_ti_num + 1, 0) as t2 from manager join `match` on mn_mt_num = mt_num where mn_me_num = 3 and mt_date = '2023-11-10') as T2 on T2.t2 = mt_ti_num left join -- 매치는 2시간동안 진행되므로 1시간 뒤 매치도 제외 (select mt_ti_num - 1 as t3 from manager join `match` on mn_mt_num = mt_num where mn_me_num = 3 and mt_date = '2023-11-10') as T3 on T3.t3 = mt_ti_num where mt_date = '2023-11-10' and mt_state1 = 1 order by ti_time asc;
